name: Battle For Gold
description:
Ahoy there!

Battle For Gold is a short endless arcade inspired shoot 'em up, where you shoot cannons at enemy ships, while you try to avoid them shooting at you.  Also avoid having them crash into you. Collect treasure and sink enemy ships to increase your score, and collect dropped barrels of oranges to regain health.  

Buttons:
Z to Shoot Up
X to Shoot Down
Arrow Keys to Move Around

Thank you for playing!
